Our guide Marcel from Hi this is Barcelona took us here for lunch and it was FABULOUS!!!!  The smoked eggplant fritters with goat cheese - my husband hates eggplant AND goat cheese and he thought they were one of the best things he ever tasted.  He said the fried calamari was the best he ever had.  I loved the anchovies and roasted red peppers especially.  Everything was absolutely delicious.  Friendly service.
